members.name: Name
members.description: Gets the name of the person or company at this address.

members.name: Street
members.description: Gets the street name.

members.name: HouseNumber
members.description: Gets the house or building number.

members.name: PostalCode
members.description: Gets the postal or ZIP code.

members.name: City
members.description: Gets the city name.

members.name: CountryCode
members.description: Gets the ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code (e.g. "DEU").

members.name: State
members.description: Gets the state or province, if applicable.

members.name: Success
members.description: Gets a value indicating whether the cancellation was successful.

members.name: Message
members.description: Gets an optional message with additional details about the result.

members.name: Name
members.description: Gets the contact person's name.

members.name: Email
members.description: Gets the email address.

members.name: Phone
members.description: Gets the phone number.

members.name: Length
members.description: Gets the length of the package.

members.name: Width
members.description: Gets the width of the package.

members.name: Height
members.description: Gets the height of the package.

members.name: Weight
members.description: Gets the weight of the package.

members.name: WeightUnit
members.description: Gets the unit of measurement for . Defaults to .

members.name: Dimensions
members.description: Gets the physical dimensions of the package, if specified.

members.name: DimensionUnit
members.description: Gets the unit of measurement for . Defaults to .

members.name: StatusCode
members.description: Gets the HTTP status code returned by the carrier API, if available.

members.name: ErrorCode
members.description: Gets the carrier-specific error code, if available.

members.name: RawResponse
members.description: Gets the raw response body from the carrier API, if available.

members.name: Format
members.description: Gets the format of the label content (e.g. PDF, ZPL).

members.name: Content
members.description: Gets the raw label content as a byte array.

members.name: Shipper
members.description: Gets the shipper (sender) address.

members.name: Consignee
members.description: Gets the consignee (recipient) address.

members.name: ShipperContact
members.description: Gets optional contact information for the shipper.

members.name: ConsigneeContact
members.description: Gets optional contact information for the consignee.

members.name: Packages
members.description: Gets the list of packages to be shipped.

members.name: Reference
members.description: Gets an optional customer reference for the shipment.

members.name: ShipDate
members.description: Gets the planned ship date, if specified.

members.name: ShipmentNumber
members.description: Gets the carrier-assigned shipment number.

members.name: Labels
members.description: Gets the list of shipping labels. May be empty if no labels were generated.

members.name: TrackingUrl
members.description: Gets the URL for tracking the shipment online, if available.

members.name: Timestamp
members.description: Gets the timestamp when this event occurred, or null when the carrier did not provide a timestamp.

members.name: Location
members.description: Gets the formatted location string (e.g. "Bonn, DE"), if available.

members.name: Description
members.description: Gets a human-readable description of the event.

members.name: StatusCode
members.description: Gets the carrier-specific status code for this event, if available.

members.name: ShipmentNumber
members.description: Gets the shipment number.

members.name: Status
members.description: Gets the current overall tracking status.

members.name: Events
members.description: Gets the chronological list of tracking events. May be empty.

members.name: EstimatedDelivery
members.description: Gets the estimated delivery date and time, if available.

members.name: Services
members.description: Gets the underlying service collection.

members.name: ApiKey
members.description: Gets or sets the DHL API key (also used as OAuth client_id).

members.name: ApiSecret
members.description: Gets or sets the DHL API secret (OAuth client_secret). Required for shipping operations.

members.name: Username
members.description: Gets or sets the DHL ROPC username. Required for shipping operations.

members.name: Password
members.description: Gets or sets the DHL ROPC password. Required for shipping operations.

members.name: TrackingUsername
members.description: Gets or sets the Parcel DE Tracking XML API appname credential. Required for Dhl.Tracking (Parcel DE Tracking v0). Sandbox default: zt12345.

members.name: TrackingPassword
members.description: Gets or sets the Parcel DE Tracking XML API password credential. Required for Dhl.Tracking (Parcel DE Tracking v0). Sandbox default: geheim.

members.name: InternetmarkeUsername
members.description: Gets or sets separate Internetmarke (Portokasse) username. If null, is used instead.

members.name: InternetmarkePassword
members.description: Gets or sets separate Internetmarke (Portokasse) password. If null, is used instead.

members.name: UseSandbox
members.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the DHL sandbox environment.

members.name: CustomShippingBaseUrl
members.description: Gets or sets a custom base URL override for the shipping API. When set, this takes precedence over the setting.

members.name: CustomTrackingBaseUrl
members.description: Gets or sets a custom base URL override for the Parcel DE Tracking API.

members.name: CustomUnifiedTrackingBaseUrl
members.description: Gets or sets a custom base URL override for the Unified Tracking API.

members.name: CustomPickupBaseUrl
members.description: Gets or sets a custom base URL override for the Pickup API.

members.name: CustomReturnsBaseUrl
members.description: Gets or sets a custom base URL override for the Returns API.

members.name: CustomInternetmarkeBaseUrl
members.description: Gets or sets a custom base URL override for the Internetmarke API.

members.name: CustomLocationFinderBaseUrl
members.description: Gets or sets a custom base URL override for the Location Finder API.

members.name: ShippingBaseUrl
members.description: Gets the effective shipping API base URL (Parcel DE Shipping v2).

members.name: TrackingBaseUrl
members.description: Gets the effective Parcel DE Tracking base URL (v0, XML).

members.name: UnifiedTrackingBaseUrl
members.description: Gets the effective Unified Tracking base URL (JSON). No sandbox available.

members.name: PickupBaseUrl
members.description: Gets the effective Pickup API base URL (Parcel DE Pickup v3).

members.name: ReturnsBaseUrl
members.description: Gets the effective Returns API base URL (Parcel DE Returns v1).

members.name: InternetmarkeBaseUrl
members.description: Gets the effective Internetmarke API base URL (Post DE Internetmarke v1). No sandbox available.

members.name: LocationFinderBaseUrl
members.description: Gets the effective Location Finder API base URL (Unified v1). No sandbox available.

members.name: CustomTokenUrl
members.description: Gets or sets a custom token endpoint URL override. When set, this takes precedence over the default DHL ROPC token URL.

members.name: Dispose()
members.description: Disposes the semaphore used for thread synchronization.

members.name: Type
members.description: Gets the type of delivery address. Defaults to .

members.name: LockerId
members.description: Gets the Packstation locker ID, if delivering to a locker.

members.name: PostOfficeId
members.description: Gets the post office ID, if delivering to a post office.

members.name: PoBoxId
members.description: Gets the PO box ID, if delivering to a PO box.

members.name: Format
members.description: Gets the desired label output format. Defaults to .

members.name: PrintFormat
members.description: Gets the paper size for the label. Defaults to .

members.name: Combine
members.description: Gets a value indicating whether to combine multiple labels into a single document.

members.name: IncludeDocs
members.description: Gets a value indicating whether to include additional documents (e.g. customs forms).

members.name: BillingNumber
members.description: Gets the DHL billing number (14-digit EKP + product + participation).

members.name: Product
members.description: Gets the DHL shipping product. Defaults to .

members.name: Profile
members.description: Gets the optional DHL business customer profile name.

members.name: DhlConsignee
members.description: Gets DHL-specific consignee delivery options (locker, post office, etc.).

members.name: ValueAddedServices
members.description: Gets optional value-added services for the shipment.

members.name: LabelOptions
members.description: Gets optional label generation options.

members.name: PreferredDay
members.description: Gets the preferred delivery day in ISO 8601 format (e.g. "2026-02-20").

members.name: PreferredLocation
members.description: Gets the preferred drop-off location description (e.g. "Garage").

members.name: PreferredNeighbour
members.description: Gets the preferred neighbour name for alternative delivery.

members.name: CashOnDeliveryAmount
members.description: Gets the cash on delivery amount, if applicable.

members.name: CashOnDeliveryCurrency
members.description: Gets the currency for . Defaults to EUR if not specified.

members.name: AdditionalInsurance
members.description: Gets a value indicating whether additional insurance is requested.

members.name: BulkyGoods
members.description: Gets a value indicating whether the shipment is classified as bulky goods.

members.name: NamedPersonOnly
members.description: Gets a value indicating whether delivery is restricted to the named person only.

members.name: NoNeighbourDelivery
members.description: Gets a value indicating whether neighbour delivery should be prevented.

members.name: InsuredValue
members.description: Gets the declared insured value amount, if applicable.

members.name: InsuredValueCurrency
members.description: Gets the currency for . Defaults to EUR if not specified.

members.name: Success
members.description: Gets a value indicating whether the manifest was created successfully.

members.name: Message
members.description: Gets an optional message with additional details about the result.

members.name: Property
members.description: Gets the property path that caused the validation issue, if available.

members.name: Message
members.description: Gets the validation message text.

members.name: Severity
members.description: Gets the severity level of this validation issue.

members.name: Valid
members.description: Gets a value indicating whether the shipment data is valid.

members.name: Messages
members.description: Gets the list of validation messages. May contain warnings even when is true.

members.name: Language
members.description: Gets the preferred language code for tracking event descriptions (e.g. "de", "en"). Defaults to "de".

members.name: ZipCode
members.description: Gets the recipient zip code for enhanced tracking data (required for some request types).

members.name: Services
members.description: Gets the underlying service collection.

members.name: Username
members.description: Gets or sets the GO! Connect API username for Basic Auth.

members.name: Password
members.description: Gets or sets the GO! Connect API password for Basic Auth.

members.name: ResponsibleStation
members.description: Gets or sets the 3-character responsible station code (e.g. "FRA"). Required for shipping operations.

members.name: CustomerId
members.description: Gets or sets the customer ID (max 7 characters).

members.name: UseSandbox
members.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the GO! Express sandbox environment.

members.name: CustomBaseUrl
members.description: Gets or sets a custom base URL override. When set, this takes precedence over the setting.

members.name: BaseUrl
members.description: Gets the effective API base URL. Uses if set, otherwise selects sandbox or production based on .

members.name: Service
members.description: Gets or sets the GO! Express service type (e.g. ON, INT, LET).

members.name: Pickup
members.description: Gets or sets the pickup time window.

members.name: Delivery
members.description: Gets or sets the optional delivery time window.

members.name: SelfPickup
members.description: Gets or sets whether the sender delivers to the GO! station (self-pickup by GO!).

members.name: SelfDelivery
members.description: Gets or sets whether the recipient picks up at the GO! station (self-delivery).

members.name: FreightCollect
members.description: Gets or sets whether the recipient pays the freight.

members.name: IdentCheck
members.description: Gets or sets whether identity verification is required at delivery.

members.name: ReceiptNotice
members.description: Gets or sets whether a receipt notice is required.

members.name: InsuranceAmount
members.description: Gets or sets the insurance amount.

members.name: InsuranceCurrency
members.description: Gets or sets the insurance currency (e.g. "EUR").

members.name: CashOnDeliveryAmount
members.description: Gets or sets the cash on delivery amount.

members.name: CashOnDeliveryCurrency
members.description: Gets or sets the cash on delivery currency (e.g. "EUR").

members.name: ValueOfGoodsAmount
members.description: Gets or sets the declared value of goods.

members.name: ValueOfGoodsCurrency
members.description: Gets or sets the value of goods currency (e.g. "EUR").

members.name: CostCenter
members.description: Gets or sets an optional cost center reference.

members.name: Content
members.description: Gets or sets the shipment content description.

members.name: LabelFormat
members.description: Gets or sets the desired label format. Defaults to .

members.name: Date
members.description: Gets or sets the date.

members.name: TimeFrom
members.description: Gets or sets the earliest time.

members.name: TimeTill
members.description: Gets or sets the latest time.

members.name: IsWeekend
members.description: Gets or sets whether this is a weekend pickup/delivery.

members.name: IsHoliday
members.description: Gets or sets whether this is a holiday pickup/delivery.
